com.opengamma.strata.pricer.bond

Class BlackVolatilityExpLogMoneynessBondFutureProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.pricer.bond.BlackVolatilityExpLogMoneynessBondFutureProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BlackVolatilityBondFutureProvider, BondFutureProvider, Bean, ImmutableBean

    public final class BlackVolatilityExpLogMoneynessBondFutureProvider
extends Object
implements BlackVolatilityBondFutureProvider, ImmutableBean
    Data provider of volatility for bond future options in the log-normal or Black model.

    The volatility is represented by a surface on the expiry and log moneyness. The expiry is measured in number of days (not time) according to a day-count convention.
